item.title: Need help with something
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

public void q11help() { if (member = true)) { triggerTele(2741, 3574, 0); sM("Welcome to the Member Hangout place."); } else { sM("You're not a member! Sign up at [MyWebsite]"); }

this is the exact same as your big mac burger sized code, yet it will do the same thing. If not, try this one:

public void q11help() { if (member = true)) { triggerTele(2741, 3574, 0); sM("Welcome to the Member Hangout place."); } else { sM("You're not a member! Sign up at [MyWebsite]"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with something
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I am trying to make a quest tab teleport to a member area that only members can use but it lets anyone through. I’ve tried many different combinations of the code below but they still let everyone who clicks on it through.

public void q11help() { if (member = true) { toX = 2741; toY = 3574; heightLevel = 0; sM("Welcome to the Member Hangout place."); } else if (member != true) { I've also tried member == false and none work.!!! sM("You're not a member! Sign up at [MyWebsite]."); } }
Ive also tried member = false and nothing i tried worked. It still let everyone through. help!

Read full topic
